title: League wont open and before anyone says avast is the p[roblem i dont fucking have avast
body:
Hello fellow summoners,

I woke up today to play league and as I clicked on my launcher the league icon popped up then disappeared, instead of the login screen appearing nothing showed up on my screen.

Solutions I have tried
- Reinstalling League, same problem soon as I click on the launcher nothing would open.
- I tried turning my antivirus system off while I opened league, nothing would happen again.
- Restarted my computer multiple times.
- Restored League to an earlier date, still nothing.
- Delete the folder: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher, I then restarted league and still nothing.
- Delete everything inside C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads
 lol_air_client and lol_air_client_config_na inside C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects
 everything inside C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions
 After deleting , I restarted my computer. When I restarted, I ran my League of Legends in Administrator Mode. STILL NOTHING

I have tried everything I mean fucking everything... I think, any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks xx

replies.body: SOLUTION: Quit League. I have had this problem for at least a week now. After I quit league and started playing heroes of the storm my life has been 10 times better. Stored that $50 league card in my room and just living with Heroes of the Storm
